full_title: KAKSS Cast Iron Kettlebell 8kg, Black Kettlebells with Wide Grip Handle and Flat Base, Solid Strength Training Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Workouts

Highlighted distinguishing features from the product facts ('Wide Grip Handle', 'Flat Base', 'Solid') to enhance appeal and differentiate from competitors.
